*** Setting ***
Suite Teardown    Fail    Failure in suite teardown

*** Variable ***
${ALSO}           \n\nAlso teardown of the parent suite failed.

*** Test Case ***
PTD FTD Passing
    [Documentation]    FAIL Teardown of the parent suite failed.${ALSO}
    No Operation

PTD FTD Failing
    [Documentation]    FAIL Failure in test${ALSO}${ALSO}
    Fail    Failure in test
